title: 17 SAARC Summit:  Social justice, climate change require immediate action, says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa says the issues which call for attention of the SAARC region, particularly in the areas of social justice and climate change require not further discussion but immediate action. The President of Sri Lanka made these remarks in his address on the inauguration…
